actions.query: SELECT [KlarnaPayments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[KlarnaPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [KlarnaPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID ,[KlarnaPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [KlarnaPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,  [KlarnaPayments].[Currency] as Currency ,[PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [KlarnaPayments].[Description] as Description   FROM [Europay].[dbo].[KlarnaPayments], [PaymentStateDefs]   where [KlarnaPayments].PaymentStateDefID = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and [KlarnaPayments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [KlarnaPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

actions.query: SELECT [KlarnaPayments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[KlarnaPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [KlarnaPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID ,[KlarnaPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [KlarnaPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,  [KlarnaPayments].[Currency] as Currency ,[PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [KlarnaPayments].[Description] as Description   FROM [Europay].[dbo].[KlarnaPayments], [PaymentStateDefs]   where [KlarnaPayments].PaymentStateDefID = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and [KlarnaPayments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [KlarnaPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT [KlarnaPayments].[PaymentID] as ID ,[KlarnaPayments].[GPaymentID] as TransactionID ,  [KlarnaPayments].[MerchantID] as MerchantID ,[KlarnaPayments].[MerchantTID] as MerchantTID , [KlarnaPayments].[Amount] as Amount ,  [KlarnaPayments].[Currency] as Currency ,[PaymentStateDefs].[Name] as Status , [KlarnaPayments].[Description] as Description   FROM [Europay].[dbo].[KlarnaPayments], [PaymentStateDefs]   where [KlarnaPayments].PaymentStateDefID = [PaymentStateDefs].PaymentStateDefID and [KlarnaPayments].GPaymentID = @TRXID and [KlarnaPayments].[MerchantID]=@MID

SELECT t2.ActionTypeID, t1.Amount as PaymentAmount, t2.Amount as RefundAmount, PaymentStateDefs.Name as RefundStatus, t1.AvailableAmount as PaymentAvailableAmount from KlarnaPayments t1 join KlarnaPayments t2 on t1.GPaymentID = t2.InitialTransactionID join PaymentStateDefs on t2.PaymentStateDefID = PaymentStateDefs.PaymentStateDefID where t2.GPaymentID = @TRXID and t2.MerchantID = @MID
